docs.snippet: This could be the story of an American dream. An immigrant family builds a successful business and buys a four-bedroom house in a quiet neighborhood with good schools for their young son. But not all is as it seems on the steep, curving streets of...
docs.lead_paragraph: This could be the story of an American dream. An immigrant family builds a successful business and buys a four-bedroom house in a quiet neighborhood with good schools for their young son. But not all is as it seems on the steep, curving streets of San Diego's Rancho Penasquitos.

headline.main: Counterfeiter Evades US Lawsuits and Gets Green Card
headline.print_headline: Counterfeiter Evades US Lawsuits and Gets Green Card

docs.snippet: Republican presidential hopeful Donald Trump criticized U.S. immigration and trade policies on Saturday in speeches that veered from accusing Mexico of deliberately sending criminals across the border to professing respect for the Mexican governme...
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential hopeful Donald Trump criticized U.S. immigration and trade policies on Saturday in speeches that veered from accusing Mexico of deliberately sending criminals across the border to professing respect for the Mexican government and love for its people.

headline.main: Trump Criticizes Border Policy as Well as Trade Agenda
headline.print_headline: Trump Criticizes Border Policy as Well as Trade Agenda

docs.snippet: Sheriff Ross Mirkarimi defended his department and said the federal authorities knew the suspect was in jail for two weeks before his release and the subsequent killing....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sheriff Ross Mirkarimi defended his department and said the federal authorities knew the suspect was in jail for two weeks before his release and the subsequent killing.
docs.abstract: San Francisco Sheriff Ross Mirkarimi, who has lost most of his political allies over series of controversies, is subject of criticism after former prisoner Juan Francisco Lopez-Sanchez is implicated in fatal shooting of woman on Embarcadero pier; local law enforcement officials did not report release of Lopez-Sanchez, Mexican felon who has spent years in American jails and been deported five times, to Federal Immigration officials because of local ordinance forbidding them to do so.

headline.main: Sheriff in San Francisco Faults Federal Authorities After Killing
headline.print_headline: Killing in San Francisco Turns Heat on Sheriff and the City’s Immigration Policies

docs.snippet: A crowd of furious Bosnian Muslims jumped over fences and attacked Serbia's prime minister with stones and water bottles on Saturday, marring the 20th anniversary commemorations of the Srebrenica massacre....

headline.main: Srebrenica Ceremonies Marred by Attack on Serbia's Premier
